text: "O Arise, All You Sons" is the national anthem of Papua New Guinea. ==Lyrics== English original Tok Pisin translation I O arise all you sons of this land, Let us sing of our joy to be free, Praising God and rejoicing to be Papua New Guinea! Shout our name from the mountains to seas Papua New Guinea; Let us raise our voices and proclaim Papua New Guinea! II Now give thanks to the good Lord above For His kindness, His wisdom and love For this land of our fathers so free, Papua New Guinea! Shout again for the whole world to hear Papua New Guinea; We're independent and we're free Papua New Guinea! I O arais, ol yu pipel bilong dispela lan, Larim singsing bilong amamas malolo bilong milpela, Lotu God na mekim tu bilong Papua Niugini! Kolim neim bilong mipela bilong maunten na solwara Papua Niugini; Larim rais nek bilong mipela na tok Papua Niugini! II Nau yumipela tenkim gutpela Lod antap Long kainis, wisdom na laikim bilong em Long dispela lan bilong yumipela papas so malolo, Papua Niugini. Tok strong gen long graun tu harim, Papua Niugini; Yumi independan na yumi malolo Papua Niugini. ==References== Category:Oceanian anthems Category:National symbols of Papua New Guinea
title: O Arise, All You Sons
